Reviews.Title: Extra cable
Reviews.Author: AM
Reviews.Content: More ccable means more choice in the positions and places we can stage our security cameras. At first I bought the 4camera system,and found many blank sections around our home. So invested for 4 more cameras, and covered most entry areas, and also two facing the doors from the inside out. so very pleased with this system, I mean you can't read the pocket insignia but can tell if it's an intruder.

Reviews.Title: It's a cable
Reviews.Author: SluggoMagoo
Reviews.Content: It's a plastic coated copper wire and it provides connectivity between my DVR and a CCTV camera. No problems with it.
